name: King Rabbit - Classic
description:
Rescue rabbits from enemies! Play and create unlimited levels and share them with the world. Designing your own levels has never been this easy and fun. A mix of puzzle and action gameplay will keep you hopping for more! Downloaded over 1.5 million times.

FEATURES:

• 25,000+ free levels
• Infinite level possibilities
• Share your level designs
• Customize your rabbit
• Game Center leaderboards and achievements
• Backup your progress with iCloud
• Record or broadcast your gameplay
• Simple swipe to move gameplay

AWARDS:

• 100 best mobile games of 2016, 5 stars - TouchArcade
• 15 cutest games - Apple
• IndieFunPlus 2016 Finalist - FunPlus
• PocketGamer game of the week - PocketGamer
• 91 average score - Metacritic
• Best new games March 2016 - Apple
